title: Captain America: Winter Soldier, Vol. 2
description:
The questions plaguing Captain America's dreams and memories have been answered in the most brutal way possible. And in the wake of this brutality, General Lukin makes his first all-out assault - tearing open old wounds and threatening to make new scars that will never heal!Collecting: 
Captain America 8-9, 11-14
author: Ed Brubaker
